name: Crazy Cook (Skinner Space)
description:
You have to cook burgers and throw them into the mouths of your busy customers before they lose their patience. 

Be cautious! Your customers have certain preferences. If you feed a vegetarian with beef he will vomit it back at your face! 

Furniture is re-arranged any time you turn back so you can't just memorize the position of each ingredient. 

Your goal is to earn enough money before the time. Cook fast and pass the test of a chief to become the best cook!

Unlock the cockroach mode and play the game from the opposite view! Eat burgers and vomit them at the cook!

BUY the game NOW and get the official soundtrack as a bonus!
